description: Twenty years after her iconic Live And More album, Donna Summer's Live And More Encore showcases the Queen of Disco in concert with this special extended broadcast, featuring On The Radio, I Feel Love, Dim All The Lights and many ...
keywords: tv special,reference to rod stewart,concert film,pop music,independent film
name: Donna Summer: Live and More... Encore!

original_info.id: Donna Summer: Live and More Encore_1999
original_info.name: Donna Summer: Live and More Encore

review.name: Donna Summer Gives Her Very Best
review.reviewBody:
During the hedonistic "Disco Era" in pop music history (1972-1979) - Donna Summer (1948-2012) was, without question, one of the most popular and widely celebrated performers of her generation, bar none.

Filmed before a live audience (in 1999) at the Hammerstein Ballroom, NYC - This entertaining "Encore!" presentation offers the viewer an excellent opportunity to see and hear Donna Summer (backed by a band of first-rate musicians) who was still very much at the top of her game (at the age of 50) as a truly dynamic singer.
